T1.label: MAM & CGM Growth
T1.description: Macquarie Group executes on growth strategy; earnings accelerate
T1.plain_english: This is the bull case — Macquarie Group delivers on its key initiatives and the market rewards it.
T1.what_to_watch: Next earnings result and forward guidance.
T1.upside: Material re-rating if execution surprises to the upside.
T1.risk_plain: If growth disappoints, this narrative weakens.

T2.label: Cycle Normalisation
T2.description: Macquarie Group delivers steady-state results; valuation holds
T2.plain_english: The company continues on its current trajectory — neither surprising positively nor negatively.
T2.risk_plain: If the base case is already priced in, limited upside from here.

T3.label: Regulatory Tightening
T3.description: Macquarie Group faces headwinds; earnings or multiples compress
T3.plain_english: This is the bear case — something goes wrong and the stock de-rates.
T3.what_to_watch: Cost pressures, competitive threats, or macro headwinds.
T3.risk_plain: Material downside if multiple risks crystallise simultaneously.

T4.label: Green Energy Transition
T4.description: A structural shift changes the investment case for Macquarie Group
T4.plain_english: An external force — technology, regulation, or competition — fundamentally alters the business.
T4.what_to_watch: Industry disruption signals and regulatory changes.
T4.risk_plain: If disruption materialises, prior assumptions become invalid.

big_picture: Macquarie Group (ASX: MQG) — coverage initiated. Full analysis pending.
